verse.name: v1
verse.lines: You thought of us before the world began to breathe newline You knew our names before we came to be newline you saw the very day we'd fall away from you newline and how desperately we need to be redeemed

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Lord Jesus, come lead us newline We're desperate for your touch

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Oh great and mighty One, with one desire we come newline That you would reign, that you would reign in us newline We're offering up our lives, a living sacrifice newline that you would reign, that you would reign in us.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Spirit of the Living God, fall fresh again newline Come search our hearts and purify our lives newline We need your perfect love, we need your discipline newline We're lost unless you guide us with your light.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: We cry out for your life to revive us, cry out newline For Your love to define us, cry out newline For your merc to keep us blameless until you return

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: So reign, please reign in us newline Come purify our hearts, we need your touch newline Come cleanse us likea flood and send us out newline So the world may know you reign, You reign in us.
